@wp.kernel
def rand_expr_asuwav(data: wp.array(dtype=float)):
    tid = wp.tid()
    v0 = data[tid]
    v1 = 0.0
    v2 = 1.0
    tmp = 0.0
    v1 = (v1 / tmp)
    tmp = (v1 * tmp)
    v2 = (0.87 - wp.exp(wp.abs(v1 + 0.49)))
    v0 = (wp.abs(v0) + v0)
    v2 = 0.56
    data[tid] = v0
